overview:
Alan Safdi, MD is co-founder and Chief Executive Officer of eMerge Health Solutions. Dr. Safdi has been involved in the development of unique physician solutions in addition to providing strategic business leadership for eMerge. In addition to being the CEO of eMerge Health Solutions, Dr. Safdi is the president of Ohio Gastroenterology and Liver Institute. Dr. Safdi is also the past Chairman of the Cincinnati Medical Advisory Committee of the Crohn’s and Colitis Foundation and is a proven leader in the healthcare arena. Dr. Safdi has established multiple surgery centers and is a co-founder of Ohio GI and Liver Institute, Consultants for Clinical Research and other successful healthcare businesses. Dr. Safdi co-founded one of the first free standing outpatient endoscopy center in the United States which was sold to a national company within the first 3 years.

Dr. Safdi received his medical degree from University of Cincinnati Medical School and undergraduate degree from Northwestern University. He graduated with honors with Phi Beta Kappa from Northwestern and the honorary society of A.O.A. from medical school. He did his fellowship at the University of California in San Diego. . Dr. Safdi is board certified in Internal Medicine and in Gastroenterology and is a Fellow of the American College of Gastroenterology. He has published in numerous peer reviewed journals in Gastroenterology and been involved in clinical research for 27 years.
